Message-ID: <62.ae458bf.278f7c41@...>

Subject: Re: Galvatron makes an impact
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 129
From: Rudra656@...

::Enertron::
    As the tail engulfed him he turned his palm outward and began blasting 
gaping holes in the sides of it.  Once he had a big enough hole he stuck his 
arm out and used his energy blade to slash the tail off directly above his 
head.  It was then an easy matter to free himself.  He mustered his energy 
and got out of range before Galvatron could regrow yet another time.  He 
placed his hand to his sides.  First the left then the right.  He let out 
tiny amounts of energy to accelerate his repair functions.  He then did the 
same thing to his shoulder.  He still had only one arm but at least now he 
was in fighting shape.  All the time he spent repairing he stared directly at 
Galvatron so that he couldn't sneak up again. He then adopted a fighting 
stance to wait.
